# Files and directories to ignore during Claude AI analysis

# Dependencies
node_modules/
vendor/
.pnp.*

# Build outputs
dist/
build/
*.min.js
*.min.css

# Cache directories
.cache/
.tmp/
.temp/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
thumbs.db

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Logs
*.log
logs/

# Environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Database files
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# Large media files
*.jpg
*.jpeg
*.png
*.gif
*.mp4
*.mov
*.avi

# Documentation builds
docs/_build/
site/

# Test coverage
coverage/
.nyc_output/
.coverage

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
